# loader-runner

``` js
import ***REMOVED*** runLoaders ***REMOVED*** from "loader-runner";

runLoaders(***REMOVED***
	resource: "/abs/path/to/file.txt?query",
	// String: Absolute path to the resource (optionally including query string)

	loaders: ["/abs/path/to/loader.js?query"],
	// String[]: Absolute paths to the loaders (optionally including query string)
	// ***REMOVED***loader, options***REMOVED***[]: Absolute paths to the loaders with options object

	context: ***REMOVED*** minimize: true ***REMOVED***,
	// Additional loader context which is used as base context

	readResource: fs.readFile.bind(fs)
	// A function to read the resource
	// Must have signature function(path, function(err, buffer))

***REMOVED***, function(err, result) ***REMOVED***
	// err: Error?

	// result.result: Buffer | String
	// The result

	// result.resourceBuffer: Buffer
	// The raw resource as Buffer (useful for SourceMaps)

	// result.cacheable: Bool
	// Is the result cacheable or do it require reexecution?

	// result.fileDependencies: String[]
	// An array of paths (files) on which the result depends on

	// result.contextDependencies: String[]
	// An array of paths (directories) on which the result depends on
***REMOVED***)
```
